languages.text: Commissars of the Officio Prefectus are ruthless officers charged with maintaining the morale, discipline, and fighting spirit of their Astra Militarum regiment. You used to be one of these faithful servants of the God-Emperor, a living symbol of Imperium authority, regarded with a mix of fear and awe by their subordinates.
languages.original_text: Задача комиссаров Оффицио Префектус — следить за неукоснительным соблюдением дисциплины и поддерживать боевой дух во вверенном им полку Астра Милитарум. Эти непреклонные офицеры — живые символы имперской власти, внушающие подчиненным страх и благоговение. В число этих преданных слуг Бога-Императора входили и вы.

traits.locale_text: Commissars of the Officio Prefectus are ruthless officers charged with maintaining the morale, discipline, and fighting spirit of their Astra Militarum regiment. You used to be one of these faithful servants of the God-Emperor, a living symbol of Imperium authority, regarded with a mix of fear and awe by their subordinates.

Commissars of the Officio Prefectus are ruthless officers charged with maintaining the morale, discipline, and fighting spirit of their Astra Militarum regiment. You used to be one of these faithful servants of the God-Emperor, a living symbol of Imperium authority, regarded with a mix of fear and awe by their subordinates.

Commissars of the Officio Prefectus are ruthless {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}officers{/g} charged with maintaining the morale, discipline, and fighting spirit of their Astra Militarum regiment. You used to be one of these faithful servants of the God-Emperor, a living symbol of Imperium authority, regarded with a mix of fear and awe by their subordinates.

Commissars of the Officio Prefectus are ruthless officers charged with maintaining the morale, discipline, and fighting spirit of their Astra Militarum regiment. You used to be one of these faithful servants of the God-Emperor, a living symbol of Imperium authority, regarded with a mix of fear and awe by their subordinates.

languages.text: Kommissare des Officio Prefectus sind unbarmherzige Offiziere, deren Aufgabe es ist, die Moral, die Disziplin und den Kampfgeist ihres Astra Militarum-Regiments aufrecht zu erhalten. Früher warst du einer dieser treuen Diener des Gottimperators, ein lebendes Symbol der Autorität des Imperiums, das von seinen Untergebenen mit einer Mischung aus Angst und Ehrfurcht betrachtet wurde.
languages.original_text: Commissars of the Officio Prefectus are ruthless officers charged with maintaining the morale, discipline, and fighting spirit of their Astra Militarum regiment. You used to be one of these faithful servants of the God-Emperor, a living symbol of Imperium authority, regarded with a mix of fear and awe by their subordinates.

traits.locale_text: Kommissare des Officio Prefectus sind unbarmherzige Offiziere, deren Aufgabe es ist, die Moral, die Disziplin und den Kampfgeist ihres Astra Militarum-Regiments aufrecht zu erhalten. Früher warst du einer dieser treuen Diener des Gottimperators, ein lebendes Symbol der Autorität des Imperiums, das von seinen Untergebenen mit einer Mischung aus Angst und Ehrfurcht betrachtet wurde.

Kommissare des Officio Prefectus sind unbarmherzige {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Offiziere{/g}, deren Aufgabe es ist, die Moral, die Disziplin und den Kampfgeist ihres Astra Militarum-Regiments aufrecht zu erhalten. Früher warst du einer dieser treuen Diener des Gottimperators, ein lebendes Symbol der Autorität des Imperiums, das von seinen Untergebenen mit einer Mischung aus Angst und Ehrfurcht betrachtet wurde.

languages.text: Les commissaires de l'Officio Prefectus sont d'impitoyables officiers chargés de veiller au moral des troupes, de faire régner la discipline dans les rangs et d'insuffler la combativité nécessaire aux soldats de leur régiment de l'Astra Militarum. Vous étiez autrefois l'un de ces fidèles serviteurs de l'Empereur-Dieu, symbole vivant de l'autorité de l'Imperium, considéré avec un mélange de crainte et d'admiration par ses subordonnés.
languages.original_text: Commissars of the Officio Prefectus are ruthless officers charged with maintaining the morale, discipline, and fighting spirit of their Astra Militarum regiment. You used to be one of these faithful servants of the God-Emperor, a living symbol of Imperium authority, regarded with a mix of fear and awe by their subordinates.

traits.locale_text: Les commissaires de l'Officio Prefectus sont d'impitoyables officiers chargés de veiller au moral des troupes, de faire régner la discipline dans les rangs et d'insuffler la combativité nécessaire aux soldats de leur régiment de l'Astra Militarum. Vous étiez autrefois l'un de ces fidèles serviteurs de l'Empereur-Dieu, symbole vivant de l'autorité de l'Imperium, considéré avec un mélange de crainte et d'admiration par ses subordonnés.

languages.text: 政委是冷酷无情的政务部军官，负责维持星界军的士气、纪律与战斗意志。您曾经是政委队伍中的一员。您对神皇忠心耿耿，是帝国权威的象征，您的下属对您敬畏有加。
languages.original_text: Commissars of the Officio Prefectus are ruthless officers charged with maintaining the morale, discipline, and fighting spirit of their Astra Militarum regiment. You used to be one of these faithful servants of the God-Emperor, a living symbol of Imperium authority, regarded with a mix of fear and awe by their subordinates.

traits.locale_text: 政委是冷酷无情的政务部军官，负责维持星界军的士气、纪律与战斗意志。您曾经是政委队伍中的一员。您对神皇忠心耿耿，是帝国权威的象征，您的下属对您敬畏有加。

languages.text: Los comisarios del Officio Prefectus son oficiales despiadados encargados de mantener la moral, la disciplina y el espíritu de combate en su regimiento del Astra Militarum. Anteriormente formaste parte de este grupo sirvientes del Dios Emperador, un símbolo viviente de la autoridad del Imperium, a quien sus subordinados miran con admiración y temor.
languages.original_text: Commissars of the Officio Prefectus are ruthless officers charged with maintaining the morale, discipline, and fighting spirit of their Astra Militarum regiment. You used to be one of these faithful servants of the God-Emperor, a living symbol of Imperium authority, regarded with a mix of fear and awe by their subordinates.

traits.locale_text: Los comisarios del Officio Prefectus son oficiales despiadados encargados de mantener la moral, la disciplina y el espíritu de combate en su regimiento del Astra Militarum. Anteriormente formaste parte de este grupo sirvientes del Dios Emperador, un símbolo viviente de la autoridad del Imperium, a quien sus subordinados miran con admiración y temor.

languages.text: 帝国管理局のコミッサーは、帝国防衛軍連帯の士気、規律、闘争心を維持することを任務とする冷酷な将校だ。あなたはかつて、神帝陛下の忠実なしもべの一人であり、帝国の権威の生きた象徴であり、部下たちから恐怖と畏怖の入り混じった目で見られていた。
languages.original_text: Commissars of the Officio Prefectus are ruthless officers charged with maintaining the morale, discipline, and fighting spirit of their Astra Militarum regiment. You used to be one of these faithful servants of the God-Emperor, a living symbol of Imperium authority, regarded with a mix of fear and awe by their subordinates.

traits.locale_text: 帝国管理局のコミッサーは、帝国防衛軍連帯の士気、規律、闘争心を維持することを任務とする冷酷な将校だ。あなたはかつて、神帝陛下の忠実なしもべの一人であり、帝国の権威の生きた象徴であり、部下たちから恐怖と畏怖の入り混じった目で見られていた。

languages.text: Задача комиссаров Оффицио Префектус — следить за неукоснительным соблюдением дисциплины и поддерживать боевой дух во вверенном им полку Астра Милитарум. Эти непреклонные офицеры — живые символы имперской власти, внушающие подчиненным страх и благоговение. В число этих преданных слуг Бога-Императора входили и вы.

languages.text: Officio Prefektus komiserleri; Astra Militarum alaylarının moralini, disiplinini ve savaşçı ruhunu korumakla mükellef acımasız subaylardır. Eskiden Tanrı İmparator'un bu sadık hizmetkârlarındandın. İmparatorluk otoritesinin kanlı canlı sembolüydün ve astların sana korku ve huşuyla karışık bir saygıyla bakardı.
languages.original_text: Commissars of the Officio Prefectus are ruthless officers charged with maintaining the morale, discipline, and fighting spirit of their Astra Militarum regiment. You used to be one of these faithful servants of the God-Emperor, a living symbol of Imperium authority, regarded with a mix of fear and awe by their subordinates.
